Question: The Miami Heat retired the number 23 jersey on April 11, 2003, even though this person had never played for the team.
Hints: This person then slowly dribbled upcourt and paused at the top of the key, eyeing his defender, Jazz guard Bryon Russell.
This person led the league in scoring with 30.4 ppg, and won the league's regular season and All-Star Game MVP awards.
This person's yearly income from the endorsements is estimated to be over forty million dollars.
